actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: Resolution requesting the President to convene a White House Conference on Small Business.

summary.text: Requests the President of the United States to convene a White House Conference on Small Business with the help of the House Small Business Committee to develop recommendations, including suggestions for joint legislative and executive action for revitalizing and maintaining the economic viability of the small business infrastructure.

titles.title: Resolution requesting the President to convene a White House Conference on Small Business.
